Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class DevelopmentCardTable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedDevelopmentCardTable
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.DevelopmentCardTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DevelopmentCardTable
extends RedDevelopmentCardTable
DevelopmentCardTable Class contains all 12 Development Card decks available for the player to buy. All decks are stored in a 2D array of DevelopmentCardDeck-type object.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopmentCardTable

      public DevelopmentCardTable()
      Constructor for DevelopmentCardTable Class.

      This method uses "JSONReader" Class to read all cards from a .json file. Development Cards are then stored inside the 2D array containing all decks.

    • DevelopmentCardTable

      public DevelopmentCardTable​(RedDevelopmentCardDeck[][] decks)
      Alternative Constructor for DevelopmentCardTable Class.

  • Method Details

    • getDeck

      public DevelopmentCardDeck getDeck​(int row, int column)
      Returns the deck corresponding to the specified coordinates.
      Overrides:
      getDeck in class RedDevelopmentCardTable
      Parameters:
      row - is the row corresponding to the deck.
      column - is the column corresponding to the deck.
      Returns:
      the requested Development Card deck.

    • updateCardToBuyCost

      public void updateCardToBuyCost​(DevelopmentCard cardToBuy, LeaderCard[] leaderCards, ResourceManager resourceManager)
      This method is used when a player wants to buy a specified Development Card to update the card's cost, preparing the player for the paying process.
      Parameters:
      cardToBuy - Development Card which the player wants to buy.
      leaderCards - player's owned Leader Cards.
      resourceManager - player's Resource Manager System.

    • getCardFromId

      public DevelopmentCard getCardFromId​(int id)
      Returns the Development Card corresponding to the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the card to get.

    • columnIsEmpty

      public boolean columnIsEmpty​(int column)
      Checks if a given column of the Development Card Table is empty.
      Parameters:
      column - Column to check.
      Returns:
      true if the column is empty.

    • getLowestDeckByColumn

      public DevelopmentCardDeck getLowestDeckByColumn​(int column)
      Returns the card of lowest level of a specified column.
      Parameters:
      column - Column of the deck to draw from.
      Returns:
      the drawn card or null if the card cannot be found.
